effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 841,443 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 326,191.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to send you into a frenzy, granting you 883 Critical Strike for 15 sec. While frenzied, each spell cast grants an additional 883 Critical Strike but does not refresh the duration. This effect may only occur every 1 sec.
